review: Had to stay there as there are only two hotels in Chindi, and the other one-Mamleshwar was full.  We didnâ€™t book in advance. Person in charge here plays multi roles to serve the guests. I must say that he tried his best in every manner to make our stay comfortable. Food was much better than our expectations and prepared fresh. Advisable to stay in Maharaja Suite/Maharani room for best views of mountains and Karsog Valley.
name: Adv.SiddharthVerma
